title: Of All Things, I Became a Crow - Novel Updates
tags: Adapted to Manhwa   Animal Characteristics   Appearance Changes   Beasts   Beautiful Female Lead   Couple Growth   Early Romance   Empires   European Ambience   Female Protagonist   First Love   Humanoid Protagonist   Love Interest Falls in Love First   Magic   Naive Protagonist   Nobles   Non-humanoid Protagonist   Otome Game   Politics   Power Couple   Reincarnated in a Game World   Reincarnated in Another World   Royalty   Shapeshifters   Transformation Ability   Transmigration   Unconditional Love   Werebeasts
author: Sylvester   실베스타
description:
After Yeo-ju dies in an accident, she is reincarnated as a crow in a female-oriented (otome) game she played a long time ago.

The first place she opened her eyes was in a forest, and she was afraid and terrified of the reality that she had to live as a crow in the future.

Thinking that she needs to find someone to raise her, she searches for people and finds the wounded Crown Prince Karmeut.

She hopes that the Crown Prince will take care and raise her later with utmost sincerity. She evaded the orcs, bring him food, and find some herbs to heal him…

>
